'''1.21.5 Release Candidate 2''' (known as '''1.21.5-rc2''' in the [[launcher]]) is the second and final [[release candidate]] for [[Java Edition 1.21.5]], released on March 24, 2025 to fix the final issues before the [[Spring to Life]] drop releases.<ref>{{Mcnet|minecraft-1-21-5-release-candidate-2|Minecraft 1.21.5 Release Candidate 2|March 24, 2025}}</ref>

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|project=MC|fixedin=1.21.5 Release candidate 2
|;dev
|295665|There is no blending in new chunks
|;prev
|295688|Piston movement is not applying block effects to entities
}}</onlyinclude>
